strapiPost.title: U of A To Host The 2022 USA Track & Field Combined Events Championships
strapiPost.content:
The University of Arkansas is set to host the 2022 USA Track & Field Combined Events Championships this weekend, May 6-7, at John McDonnell Field. 

  • A first for hosting: The events were moved up to June to enable more prep time for those on Team USA. It will be the first time for the University of Arkansas to host the USATF Championship, and the other championship events will be in Eugene Oregon. The events this weekend will serve as a selection for the Team USA in the heptathlon and decathlon for the 2022 World Athletics Championships. 
  • Tickets: In conjunction with the Arkansas Twilight on Friday, tickets for the USATF Combined Events Championships are available online. Tickets are $5 for adults, and individuals 17 and under can attend for free. Saturdayâ€™s session is free of charge for all spectators.
